name: Deathrun (Koki Studios)
description:
You are trapped, in this chamber running for your life, this big wall full of DEADLY Spikes are following ya! and infront are deadly traps and obstacles!

This Game Features: Custom Scenes when you die, Obstacles to avoid, Spikes and Randomly Generated map so if you win you can just redo it and itll be all completly different!

To Know more about the game and want to report bugs please join the discord server!

https://discord.gg/frpQf8ZbXH

Subscribe to my boy TheMasterD0do on YouTube (he made the cool music):

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdBckrG4ii2w3Sg8fabws6Q

Controls:

W A S D = Movement
Space = Jump

Enter = Death Cutscene Skip
